## Bee.isReferenceRetrievable() method

Checks if content specified by reference is retrievable from the network.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isReferenceRetrievable(reference: Reference | Uint8Array | string, options?: BeeRequestOptions): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

reference


</td><td>

[Reference](./bee-js-docs-project.reference.md) \| Uint8Array \| string


</td><td>

Bee data reference to be checked in hex string (either 64 or 128 chars long) or ENS domain.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[BeeRequestOptions](./bee-js-docs-project.beerequestoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Options that affects the request behavior


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

## Exceptions

TypeError if some of the input parameters is not expected type

BeeArgumentError if there is passed ENS domain with invalid unicode characters
